title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 113.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 113.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to lands owned by the State of New York, and lands owned by Orange and Rockland Utilities Corp. and Clove Development

Corp. over which conservation easements have been acquired by the State, located in the Towns of Bethel, Forestburgh, Highland, Lumberland and Thompson
in Sullivan County and Deer Park in Orange County and designated by the

Department of Environmental Conservation (department) as the Mongaup Valley

Wildlife Management Area (area). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
113.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
